sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Dr. Franciscus de le Boe Sylvius Of childrens diseases given in a familiar style for weaker capacities. With an apparatus or introduction explaining the authors principles: as also a treatise of the rickets. By R. G. physician. Le Boë, Frans de, 1614-1672. R. G. (Richard Gower). aui
[22], 148, [2] p.
printed for George Downs at the Three Flower de Luces in Fleet-street, over against St. Dunstan's Church, London : 1682.
"The apparatus", a technical introduction on medicine, signed: Richard Gower, who was also translator and author of the marginal notes. A translation; original title not traced. With a final contents leaf. Copy tightly bound with loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[22], 148, [2] p.
printed for George Downs at the Three Flower de Luces in Fleet-street, over against St. Dunstan's Church, London : 1682.
"The apparatus", a technical introduction on medicine, signed: Richard Gower, who was also translator and author of the marginal notes. A translation; original title not traced. With a final contents leaf. Copy tightly bound with loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
